frame.content:
frame → float (Read Only): Absolute total number of frames played since the application started.  Paused only with the power On/Off or with power()
Example: absTime.frame
Example: tdu.rand(absTime.frame + .1) # a unique random number that is consistent across all nodes, changing every frame

seconds.content: seconds → float (Read Only): Absolute total seconds played since the application started. Paused only with the power On/Off or with power().

step.content: step → float (Read Only): Number of absolute frames elapsed between start of previous and current frame. When this value is greater than 1, the system is dropping frames.

stepSeconds.content: stepSeconds → float (Read Only): Absolute time elapsed between start of previous and current frame.
